original_title: Steps: The End Of The Road
overview: Steps recorded live at Manchester Evening News Arena. The tracklist includes: 'One For Sorrow Sleazesisters Mix', 'Deeper Shade Of Blue Sleazesisters Mix', 'Love's Got A Hold On My Heart', 'Believe', 'After The Love Has Gone', 'If You Believe', 'It's The Way You Make Me Feel', 'Hand On Your Heart', 'I Know Him So Well', 'Last Thing On My Mind', 'You'll Be Sorry', 'Better Best Forgotten' and 'Chain Reaction'.
title: Steps: The End Of The Road
